analyzed: man+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dzam hum phat/_gshin rje gshed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/_/thal mo sbyar ba ni nag po chen po'i dam tshhig go/_/rdo rje rtshe mo lnga
translated: This is the mantra of the consecration of Yamantaka.🔽The gesture of joining the palms is the samaya of Mahakala.🔽The five-pronged vajra is the mudra of Kali.

original: pa ni nag mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/b+ha ga ltar byas pa ni dus mtshhan ma'i/_/'dzub
analyzed: pa ni nag mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/b+ha ga ltar byas pa ni dus mtshhan ma'i/_/'dzub
translated: The gesture of the bhaga is that of Kalarati.🔽The extended index finger is that of Dharmaraja.

original: mo brkyang ba ni chos kyi rgyal po'i 'o/_/phyag rgya 'di dag gis spyan drangs shing /
analyzed: mo brkyang ba ni chos kyi rgyal po'i 'o/_/phyag rgya 'di dag gis spyan drangs shing /
translated: With these mudras, one should invite the deities and give them their samaya in front.

original: mdun du dam tshhig sbyin pa ste/_om badzra ha na ha na badzra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hum
analyzed: mdun du dam tshhig sbyin pa ste/_om badzra ha na ha na badzra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hum
translated: Om vajra hana hana vajra samaya mati krama hum phat.🔽This is the mantra.

original: phat/_zhes pa ni sngags so/_/lte bar b+ha ga la gnas pa'i/_rdo rje rnal
analyzed: phat/_zhes pa ni sngags so/_/lte bar b+ha ga la gnas pa'i/_rdo rje rnal
translated: If one imagines Vajrayogini residing in the bhaga at the navel,

original: 'byor ma bsam par byas na/_bde ba chen por 'gyur te/_'jigs byed
analyzed: 'byor ma bsam par byas na/_bde ba chen por 'gyur te/_'jigs byed
translated: one will attain great bliss.🔽The great Bhairava and Kalarati are trampled.

original: chen po dang /_dus mtshhan ma mnan pa/_gri gug dang thod pa kha tam ga 'chang
analyzed: chen po dang /_dus mtshhan ma mnan pa/_gri gug dang thod pa kha tam ga 'chang
translated: They hold flaying knives, skull cups, and khatvangas.

original: ma/_steng du lta zhing dmar mo 'bar ba'i lus can ma'o/_/'di la ni bzlas
analyzed: ma/_steng du lta zhing dmar mo 'bar ba'i lus can ma'o/_/'di la ni bzlas
translated: She is red, blazing, and looks upward.

original: pa med de/_gzhan du 'di nyid sngags so/_/gshin rje gshed ni nag po nag
analyzed: pa med de/_gzhan du 'di nyid sngags so/_/gshin rje gshed ni nag po nag
translated: Here there is no recitation, but rather this itself is the mantra.🔽Yamāntaka is black,

original: rang gnas pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs🔽dkar dmar ba'i zhal/_'khor lo dang ral gri dang be con dang /_mdung
analyzed: rang gnas pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs dkar dmar ba'i zhal/_'khor lo dang ral gri dang be con dang /_mdung
translated: the great black one abiding in his own place.🔽He has red and white faces, and holds a wheel, sword, club,🔽spear, axe, and skull cup.

original: dang /_sta re dang /_thod pa bsnams pa'o/_/dur khrod kyi rgyan dang ldan pa
analyzed: dang /_sta re dang /_thod pa bsnams pa'o/_/dur khrod kyi rgyan dang ldan pa
translated: He is adorned with charnel ground ornaments🔽and rides a water buffalo.

original: ma he la zhon pa'o/_/gal te dam tshhig nyams pa la/_slob dpon rdo rje sems
analyzed: ma he la zhon pa'o/_/gal te dam tshhig nyams pa la/_slob dpon rdo rje sems
translated: If one’s sacred pledge has declined,

original: dpas bdag nyid la sogs pa bkru bar bya'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshhig
analyzed: dpas bdag nyid la sogs pa bkru bar bya'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshhig
translated: one should be cleansed by the master Vajrasattva and so forth.🔽One should request with the recitation of the sacred pledge of Vajrasattva.

original: dran pa bzlas pas gsol ba bya'o/_/cod pan gyis/_bdag la sogs pa la
analyzed: dran pa bzlas pas gsol ba bya'o/_/cod pan gyis/_bdag la sogs pa la
translated: If one meditates on the empowerment conferral of oneself and so forth

original: dbang bskur ba bsgom na/_las dang dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: dbang bskur ba bsgom na/_las dang dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
translated: with the crown, one will accomplish activities and powers.

original: gzhan yang sgrub pa bshad pa/_dbugs dbyung ba dang /_dgang ba dang / rengs pa dang /_bum pa can gyi las kyis lus dag par bya'o/_/de nas
analyzed: gzhan yang sgrub pa bshad pa/_dbugs dbyung ba dang /_dgang ba dang / rengs pa dang /_bum pa can gyi las kyis lus dag par bya'o/_/de nas
translated: Furthermore, the body should be purified by the practice of exhalation, inhalation, retention, and vase yoga.🔽Then,

original: gdol pa mo'am/_gzhan pa'i rigs kyi'o/_/pad+ma can nam/_ji ltar rnyed🔽pa'i mi mo/_b+ha ga bzang ba/_rtsha mchog dang ldan pa/_lo bcu gnyis ma la
analyzed: gdol pa mo'am/_gzhan pa'i rigs kyi'o/_/pad+ma can nam/_ji ltar rnyed pa'i mi mo/_b+ha ga bzang ba/_rtsha mchog dang ldan pa/_lo bcu gnyis ma la
translated: one should take a low-caste woman, or one of another caste, a lotus woman, or a woman of any kind that one can find,

original: sogs pa blangs nas dag par byas te rim pa ni 'di yin te/_de bzhin
analyzed: sogs pa blangs nas dag par byas te rim pa ni 'di yin te/_de bzhin
translated: who has a good bhaga, who is endowed with the supreme essence, who is twelve years old, and so on, and purify her. The stages are as follows:🔽One should meditate on Locanā, and so on,

original: gshegs pa'i btshun mo'i mchog_/spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya/_/yi ge
analyzed: gshegs pa'i btshun mo'i mchog_/spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya/_/yi ge
translated: as the supreme consort of the tathāgatas,🔽and visualize the syllables🔽huṃ, oṃ,

original: hum dang om dag dang /_/ahdang phat ni rab brtag bya/_/'od zer sna lngas khyab
analyzed: hum dang om dag dang /_/ahdang phat ni rab brtag bya/_/'od zer sna lngas khyab
translated: aḥ, and phaṭ.🔽One should meditate on the lotus and vajra🔽pervaded by five-colored light rays,

original: pa yi/_/pad+ma rdo rje rab bsgom bya/_/mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang /_/tshum
analyzed: pa yi/_/pad+ma rdo rje rab bsgom bya/_/mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang /_/tshum
translated: and when one sees, touches,🔽embraces, and always embraces the lotus of gnosis,

original: pa na dang rtag par mkhyud/_/ye shes pad+ma kha bye ba/_/rdo rje sor mo nges par
analyzed: pa na dang rtag par mkhyud/_/ye shes pad+ma kha bye ba/_/rdo rje sor mo nges par
translated: the vajra finger

original: bzhag_/'dod chags rdo rje'i tshhul gnas te/_/rdo rje'i phur bu nges par
analyzed: bzhag_/'dod chags rdo rje'i tshhul gnas te/_/rdo rje'i phur bu nges par
translated: to be planted in the place of the vajra of passion.🔽By the union of the two organs,

original: gdab/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub thob
analyzed: gdab/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub thob
translated: the attainment of the powers of the Buddha will be obtained.🔽Then, the hero, having drunk the flower water,

original: par 'gyur/_/de nas dpa' bos me tog chu/_/'thungs nas sngags ni rjes
analyzed: par 'gyur/_/de nas dpa' bos me tog chu/_/'thungs nas sngags ni rjes
translated: should recollect the mantra.

original: dran bya/_/dbugs 'byin brgyal dang rgod pa dang /_/sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo
analyzed: dran bya/_/dbugs 'byin brgyal dang rgod pa dang /_/sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo
translated: By the dance of the mudra, which is the exhalation, fainting,🔽and the laughter of the hero,

original: mtshhar bas/_/phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos/_/myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur//
analyzed: mtshhar bas/_/phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos/_/myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur//
translated: the adept will quickly attain bliss.🔽The girl is also described:

original: bu mo yang gsungs pa/_lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/_/rtshub cing spu ni🔽bstan 'gyur_rgyud
analyzed: bu mo yang gsungs pa/_lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/_/rtshub cing spu ni bstan 'gyur_rgyud
translated: She has a thick tongue, reddish-brown eyes,🔽and hair that is curly and reddish-brown.

original: dmar ser yin/_/des kyang grub par 'gyur ba ste/_/rig ma chen mo spyan la
analyzed: dmar ser yin/_/des kyang grub par 'gyur ba ste/_/rig ma chen mo spyan la
translated: She will also be successful.🔽The great knowledge-woman, Locanā, and so forth,🔽always desire the desired object.

original: sogs/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtshon pa/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod dag
analyzed: sogs/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtshon pa/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod dag
translated: By the enjoyment of the desired object,

original: gis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub/_/ces gsungs so/_/las kyi
analyzed: gis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub/_/ces gsungs so/_/las kyi
translated: one will be successful if one relies on it as desired.

original: phyag rgya'o/_/ba lang sha dang rta sha dang /_/khyi sha dag dang sna tshhogs pas/🔽dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/_/gtum mo rang gi lus las byung bas
analyzed: phyag rgya'o/_/ba lang sha dang rta sha dang /_/khyi sha dag dang sna tshhogs pas/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/_/gtum mo rang gi lus las byung bas
translated: With the flesh of oxen, horses, and dogs, and various other meats,🔽make a triangular maṇḍala, and🔽meditate on the indivisible mind that arises from one’s own body.

original: dbyer med pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o/_/chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/dngos po med
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o/_/chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/dngos po med
translated: The dharma mudra.🔽There is no meditation on the absence of entities;

original: la sgom pa med/_/bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/_/de ltar dngos po dngos
analyzed: la sgom pa med/_/bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/_/de ltar dngos po dngos
translated: the meditation is not the meditation.🔽In that way, since entities are not entities,

original: med pas/_/sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/_/chos rnams dngos po med pa la/
analyzed: med pas/_/sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/_/chos rnams dngos po med pa la/
translated: meditation is not observed.

original: chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa/_/e ma ngo mtshhar las byung ba/_/nam mkha' la
analyzed: chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa/_/e ma ngo mtshhar las byung ba/_/nam mkha' la
translated: The reality of phenomena is explained in all phenomena.🔽Amazing! The space of space is meditated in space.🔽The great mudra.

original: ni nam mkha' bsgom/_/phyag rgya chen po'o/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la/_/
analyzed: ni nam mkha' bsgom/_/phyag rgya chen po'o/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la/_/
translated: Meditate on the vajra of body, speech, and mind🔽as the vajra of Mañju.

original: rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom/_/lus dang ngag sems la spros pas/_/rdo rje
analyzed: rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom/_/lus dang ngag sems la spros pas/_/rdo rje
translated: Since the vajra of Mañju is emanated into body, speech, and mind,🔽the vajra of Mañju becomes like the vajra.

original: 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dpag tshhad brgya yi khyon tsham du/_/rdo rje 'bar
analyzed: 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dpag tshhad brgya yi khyon tsham du/_/rdo rje 'bar
translated: The vajra blazes

original: ba'i 'od dag gis/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis/_/dag pa'i bdag🔽nyid snang bar 'gyur/_/'di nye bar mtshhon pa ni kun brtags te/_dam tshhig
analyzed: ba'i 'od dag gis/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur/_/'di nye bar mtshhon pa ni kun brtags te/_dam tshhig
translated: illuminated by the light of the moon.🔽The pledge seal is the imagined one.

original: gi phyag rgya'o/_/de dag ni bsnyen pa'o/
analyzed: gi phyag rgya'o/_/de dag ni bsnyen pa'o/
translated: Those are the approach.

original: de ltar rtag tu goms pa na rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pas bdag nyid
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu goms pa na rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pas bdag nyid
translated: In that way, always cultivating, by practicing the conduct of awareness,🔽one becomes Mahākāla.

original: nag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rje btshun gyi sku gzugs zla mtshhan gyi
analyzed: nag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rje btshun gyi sku gzugs zla mtshhan gyi
translated: Moreover, one should draw the form of the lord with the secret

original: ras sam/_g.yul gyi ro ras la gsang bas bris te byin gyis brlabs nas/
analyzed: ras sam/_g.yul gyi ro ras la gsang bas bris te byin gyis brlabs nas/
translated: on a cloth from a corpse in a battle or a cloth from a corpse in a charnel ground, consecrate it,🔽and imagine that whatever is Mahākāla is the vajra master.

original: nag po chen po gang yin pa de rdo rje slob dpon du bsam pas/_ri mo'i mdun
analyzed: nag po chen po gang yin pa de rdo rje slob dpon du bsam pas/_ri mo'i mdun
translated: In front of the painting,

original: du mchod pa dang /_dug dang sha chen po dang gu gul gyi gdug pa phul nas🔽rang gnas pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: du mchod pa dang /_dug dang sha chen po dang gu gul gyi gdug pa phul nas rang gnas pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs
translated: offer a torma of poison, great meat, and gugul,🔽and supplicate.

original: gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/om badzra ma ha ka la kl-i k+she tra bin+nan bi na ya ka a
analyzed: gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/om badzra ma ha ka la kl-i k+she tra bin+nan bi na ya ka a
translated: Oṃ vajra mahākāla kīli kīlaya bandha bandha vinayaka vinayaka

original: gatsh+tshha a gatsh+tshha hu~m hu~m phat phat swa ha/_nag po chen po nyid 'ongs nas ci 'dod
analyzed: gatsh+tshha a gatsh+tshha hu~m hu~m phat phat swa ha/_nag po chen po nyid 'ongs nas ci 'dod
translated: He will come and say, What do you desire?

original: ces smra'o/_/des kyang nag po chen por mdzod cig ces byas na/_bdag nyid
analyzed: ces smra'o/_/des kyang nag po chen por mdzod cig ces byas na/_bdag nyid
translated: If one says, Make me Mahakala, one will become Mahakala himself.

original: nag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/ril bu dang /_mig sman dang /_ro dang / ral gri la sogs dang /_las thams cad ster ro/_/cho ga 'di kho nas nag mo
analyzed: nag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/ril bu dang /_mig sman dang /_ro dang / ral gri la sogs dang /_las thams cad ster ro/_/cho ga 'di kho nas nag mo
translated: He will give the pill, the eye medicine, the sword, and so forth, and all activities.

original: chen mo la sogs pa 'grub par bya'o/_/yang lang tshho dang ldan pa'i bu mo'i mgul🔽nas 'khyud nas nag mo'am/_dus kyi mtshhan ma'i gsang sngags dang bcas/_dza
analyzed: chen mo la sogs pa 'grub par bya'o/_/yang lang tshho dang ldan pa'i bu mo'i mgul nas 'khyud nas nag mo'am/_dus kyi mtshhan ma'i gsang sngags dang bcas/_dza
translated: By this very rite, one will accomplish Mahakaali and so forth.🔽 Again, if one embraces a young girl around the neck, saying Kaali, Kaali,

original: la ya dz+nya la ya zhes brjod na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzung ste spyod pa spyad🔽pas bdag nyid nag po chen po dang mtshhungs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phyag
analyzed: la ya dz+nya la ya zhes brjod na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzung ste spyod pa spyad pas bdag nyid nag po chen po dang mtshhungs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phyag
translated: and recites the secret mantra of the lunar asterisms, Jvala jvala, she will blaze.🔽 If one holds her and engages in conduct, one will become equal to Mahakala.

original: mtshhan rnams dang /_lha dang 'byung po thams cad nag po chen po'i bkas
analyzed: mtshhan rnams dang /_lha dang 'byung po thams cad nag po chen po'i bkas
translated: In the same way, one will become equal to the deities and all the bhutas by reciting the secret mantras of the hand implements and the deities, saying Kaali, Kaali.

original: mngag gzhug tu bya'o/_/om badzra ma ha ka la k+shi k+she tra bin+nan bi na ya ka badzra a mu
analyzed: mngag gzhug tu bya'o/_/om badzra ma ha ka la k+shi k+she tra bin+nan bi na ya ka badzra a mu
translated: “Oṃ vajra mahākāla kṣi kṣetra vinna vināyaka vajra amukaṃ🔽sadhaya sadhaya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: kam sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya hu~m hu~m phat swa ha/_mtshhon cha sgrub pa'i sngags so/_/om badzra
analyzed: kam sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya hu~m hu~m phat swa ha/_mtshhon cha sgrub pa'i sngags so/_/om badzra
translated: “This is the mantra for accomplishing the weapons.

original: ma ha ka la k+shi k+she tra big+han bi na ya ka a dz+nya ya a mu kam/_a kar+sha ya a kar+sha ya
analyzed: ma ha ka la k+shi k+she tra big+han bi na ya ka a dz+nya ya a mu kam/_a kar+sha ya a kar+sha ya
translated: Oṃ vajra mahākāla kṣi kṣetra vinna vināyaka ajñāpaya amukaṃ🔽akarṣaya akarṣaya amukaṃ sadhaya sadhaya phaṭ svāhā.

original: a mu kam sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya phat swa ha/_'byung po thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/yang
analyzed: a mu kam sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya phat swa ha/_'byung po thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/yang
translated: “This is for accomplishing all bhūtas.

original: na rdul tshhon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang sgrub ste/_mtshhan ma
analyzed: na rdul tshhon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang sgrub ste/_mtshhan ma
translated: “Alternatively, one should accomplish [the rite] by drawing the maṇḍala of the weapons and so forth.

original: mthong zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: mthong zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
translated: The yogin who sees the signs and is fearless will accomplish everything.🔽“If one is not successful, one should perform the wrathful activity.

original: ci ste ma grub na drag shul sbyor ba bya'o/_/de dag ni sgrub pa chen po'o/_/
analyzed: ci ste ma grub na drag shul sbyor ba bya'o/_/de dag ni sgrub pa chen po'o/_/
translated: This is the great accomplishment.

original: gzhan yang las kyi sbyor ba phra mo dag kyang sgrub ste/_rtshe gcig tu ma gyur
analyzed: gzhan yang las kyi sbyor ba phra mo dag kyang sgrub ste/_rtshe gcig tu ma gyur
translated: “Moreover, one should accomplish the subtle applications of activity.

original: pas kyang ngo /_/gshin rje'i 'khor lo dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang khrag dang ke
analyzed: pas kyang ngo /_/gshin rje'i 'khor lo dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang khrag dang ke
translated: Also, the wheel of Yama should be drawn on a cloth from a charnel ground with poison, blood,

original: tshhe dang /_lan tshha dang /_d+ha du ras bri'o/_/lte ba dang khang pa sum cu rtsha
analyzed: tshhe dang /_lan tshha dang /_d+ha du ras bri'o/_/lte ba dang khang pa sum cu rtsha
translated: urine, salt, and dhātrī fruit.

original: gnyis la yi ge bcu bdun dang /_nag po chen po dang _gshin rje gshed kyi
analyzed: gnyis la yi ge bcu bdun dang /_nag po chen po dang _gshin rje gshed kyi
translated: In the center and in the thirty-two chambers, the seventeen syllables and the mantras of Mahākāla and Yamāri🔽are written together with the incantation.

original: sngags kyi bskul ba dang bcas pa bri'o/_/yak+she ma me da dza sa do ru yatsh+tshha ni ra na
analyzed: sngags kyi bskul ba dang bcas pa bri'o/_/yak+she ma me da dza sa do ru yatsh+tshha ni ra na
translated: Yakṣe, mame, dajja, sado, ruyaca, haniraṇa🔽yo nir

original: yo ni ra/_de nyid nya phyis gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag nas bskul bar byas na nyi
analyzed: yo ni ra/_de nyid nya phyis gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag nas bskul bar byas na nyi
translated: . Having placed that in the middle of two oyster shells, when the incantation is performed,🔽it will kill in seven days.

original: ma bdun gyis gsod par byed do/_/de bzhin du de dang de'i cho ga las thams
analyzed: ma bdun gyis gsod par byed do/_/de bzhin du de dang de'i cho ga las thams

analyzed: cad sgrub pa ste/_'khor lo 'di ni chen po'o/_/gzhan yang 'khor lo rtshibs

analyzed: pa dang /_byis pa'i gdon rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshhe

analyzed: sbyin te las rnams bsgrubs par bya/_sreg blugs dag kyang dbul lo/_/mi
